triples.name: Generative artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper examines how generative AI tools can improve social science research methods.

triples.name: Survey (human research)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how generative AI has the potential to improve survey research.

triples.name: Web-based experiments
triples.relevance: The paper identifies online experiments as a research technique that could benefit from generative AI.

triples.name: Content analysis
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how generative AI can enable automated content analysis in social science research.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: The paper lists agent-based models as a technique for studying human behavior that could be improved by generative AI.

triples.name: Social science
triples.relevance: The paper examines the impact of generative AI on social science research methods and fields.
